title: Final Fantasy VII: Last Order
alternative_title: ラストオーダー -ファイナルファンタジーVII-
description: After the destruction of Nibelheim at the hands of Sephiroth, Zack Fair and Cloud Strife are on the run from Shinra Inc. As they make their way back to Midgar, they recall the horrible events that happened at Nibelheim, fighting for survival against Shinra.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
